entry.title: Without Words
entry.summary:
Author: Cherry_target_dna

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,277Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Stiles did not want to time travel. It was definitely not number one of his list of things to try out.But when a witch gave him the opportunity to make a few things right, who would he be to deny such a deal?Especially if it didn't cost much. Only his voice? That was a small sacrifice to make for a better future and the lives of many.
